trans-unit.source: Specifies how to retrieve additional information about the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何检索有关主题的其他信息<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlAuthorityBinding class to specify how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject within a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SamlAuthorityBinding 类可指定如何检索有关已验证主题中的其他信息<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全令牌使用指定其声明 SAML 断言，可以指定何时对主题进行身份验证。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型和其中一个是一种<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>断言在特定时间以特定方式进行身份验证语句的主题。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> also has an optional SamlAuthorityBinding, which specifies how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>还具有可选的 SamlAuthorityBinding，它指定如何检索经过身份验证的使用者有关的其他信息。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding%2A> properties to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind%2A>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding%2A>属性，以检索已验证主题的附加信息。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> class using the specified query types, protocol binding, and SAML authority location.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref>类使用指定的查询类型、 协议绑定和 SAML 授权机构位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that represents the type of queries that the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject responds to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>表示具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构响应的查询的类型。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI 引用，标识与具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构通信时使用的 SAML 协议绑定。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that describes how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI 引用，描述如何找到并与具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of queries that the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject, responds to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构响应的查询的类型。

trans-unit.source: The AuthorityKind property corresponds to the `AuthorityKind` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element, as defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: AuthorityKind 属性对应于`AuthorityKind`属性`<AuthorityBinding>`元素，如 OASIS SAML 规范中的断言和协议定义。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that represents the type of queries that the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject, responds to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>表示具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构响应的查询的类型。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The AuthorityKind property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AuthorityKind 属性设置和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: The AuthorityKind property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AuthorityKind 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与具有主题附加信息的附加信息的 SAML 授权机构通信时使用的 SAML 协议绑定。

trans-unit.source: The Binding property corresponds to the `Binding` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 绑定属性对应于`Binding`属性`<AuthorityBinding>`OASIS SAML 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI 引用，标识与具有主题附加信息的附加信息的 SAML 授权机构通信时使用的 SAML 协议绑定。

trans-unit.source: The Binding property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绑定属性设置和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: The Binding property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绑定属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例的属性是否只读的。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使此实例的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding>类只读的调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此实例的属性是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置如何找到并与具有主题附加信息的附加信息的 SAML 授权机构进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The Location property corresponds to the `Location` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 位置属性对应于`Location`属性`<AuthorityBinding>`OASIS SAML 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that describes how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI 引用，描述如何找到并与具有主题附加信息的 SAML 授权机构进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The Location property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置位置属性和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: The Location property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 位置属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 MakeReadOnly 方法时，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref>从指定的 XML 读取器的元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref>元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够读取 SAML 规范中定义的 XML 元素中 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>的数字签名的子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> ，确定创建了数字签名的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref> element does not have one of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AuthorityKind" name="AuthorityKind" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Binding" name="Binding" href=""></xref> attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""> </xref>元素不具有之一<xref uid="langword_csharp_AuthorityKind" name="AuthorityKind" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Binding" name="Binding" href=""></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 写入<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref>元素插入指定的 XML 序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>编写<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AuthorityBinding>" name="<AuthorityBinding>" href=""></xref>元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in the SAML assertion that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入 SAML 规范中定义的 SAML 断言中的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句。

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is
